resources.string: The following examples show the simplest Hover menus possible. These examples use simple tab Views and only display text in their content screens.
The following examples also use simple menus, but these menus change in a scripted fashion. These demos illustrate what happens to Hover when various things in the menu change at runtime.
Bosm Roulette is an app based betting event using which one can predict the results of a match before its start.
Each user is given a wallet balance of $200 in the beginning, using which one can bid on his favourite team.
If a user bets $x on a particular match, if his prediction is correct, his wallet balance will increase by 2*x amount otherwise the balance will decrease by x/2 amount.

If a user bets $x on a particular match, if his prediction is correct, his wallet balance will increase by 4*x amount.....\nBut if the user looses on that particular bid, he/she will lose that x amount, so be careful guys.\nThe Power Bet will be active once every 4 hours so use this on the best team.
Users can refer the app using the Share button in the side drawer.\nBoth sender and reciever will get $80.
Try Your luck by spinning the wheel and earn additional bonus points once in half an hour.If win, $50 will be awarded
